nodes.text: The Imperial Command Center was a command center utilized by the Galactic Empire on the planet Molos. During the civilian uprising on the planet, the command center was half-destroyed by mining explosives. After the uprising, Rebel Alliance Sergeant Trask looked on from a balcony at the burning building.
The Imperial Command Center was mentioned in Lead by Example, the 2016 sourcebook for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
